name: Let's Cheer!
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  Whether you’re a cheerleading pro or looking for an exciting new way to keep the beat and break a sweat, Let’s Cheer delivers authentic cheers and heart-pumping dance routines set to popular hits like “Mickey”, “Shake It” and “Disturbia.” Get fired up with 2-Player Team mode and chant out loud with voice enabled Kinect.
